meanings.definition: To work together in a cooperative effort to produce a combined effect greater than the sum of their separate effects.
meanings.sent1: The team is synergizing to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The departments are synergizing their efforts to improve efficiency.
meanings.sent3: Synergizing with my siblings to clean our room was surprisingly fun.
meanings.sent4: The dancers synergized their movements, creating a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: Synergizing with nature, the plants and animals thrive together.

meanings.definition: The act of combining efforts or resources to create a mutually beneficial result.
meanings.sent1: Synergizing between companies can lead to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The synergizing of talents in the team led to a successful product launch.
meanings.sent3: The party was a great success thanks to the synergizing of decorations and music.
meanings.sent4: The art exhibition showcased the beautiful synergizing of colors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The community garden is a perfect example of synergizing for a common goal.
